featured.text: Amir tried to get to the market on the following days, but the donkey ___(34)___ the same trick and ruined the salt.
The donkey was so much weighed down by the wet sand that he could hardly get out of the stream.
The donkey jumped into the stream to cool ___(32)___.
From then on, the donkey learned the lesson, and ___(40)___ carried Amir’s salt to the market without ruining it.

other.text: On ___(31)___, Amir and the donkey passed a stream.
When the donkey jumped into the stream and got the sacks wet, they became much ___(39)___.
Amir was very much ___(35)___ by the donkey’s trick, but did not know what to do.

definition.zh_def: 驢子，一種常見的家畜，通常用於負重或騎乘。
definition.en_def: A donkey is a domesticated animal often used for carrying loads or riding.
definition.example: The farmer used a donkey to help transport goods to the market.
